entry.title: Russian Duma Speaker lambasts European involvement in South Caucasus

media:group.media:title: Russian Duma Speaker lambasts European involvement in South Caucasus
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmen Grigoryan, the head of Armenia‚Äôs Security Council, told reporters today that a reference to an ‚Äúinternationally visible mechanism‚Äù for Karabakh may be included in a draft peace treaty between Armenia and Azerbaijan, adding that the document is not yet final and talks are ongoing. üìçAnatoly Sidorov, a senior CSTO official, said at a press conference today that the Russian-led military alliance stands ready to help Armenia ‚Äúif necessary.‚Äù Meanwhile, Vyacheslav Volodin, the head of Russia‚Äôs lower house of parliament, warned that ‚Äúthose who make appeals to European institutions could simply lose their country.‚Äù
Credits: Ruptly
#CivilNet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’© #dailyarmenia

entry.title: Thoughts about the Armenian army from a former US serviceman

media:group.media:title: Thoughts about the Armenian army from a former US serviceman
media:group.media:description:
Joe Kassabian is an author, podcaster and former U.S. serviceman who took part in several tours of Afghanistan. Kassabian sat down with CivilNet to discuss his move to Armenia, give his take on the Taliban‚Äôs takeover of Afghanistan in 2021 and explain why Armenia is in dire need of a professional army.
0:00 Coming to Armenia 6:40 Serving in Afghanistan 14:47 The U.S. role in the Caucasus 17:59 The Russia factor 24:23 Insights from a former U.S. serviceman 33:09 The need for a professional army

entry.title: ‚ÄòEarthquake diplomacy‚Äô heightens momentum for Armenia-Turkey normalization

media:group.media:title: ‚ÄòEarthquake diplomacy‚Äô heightens momentum for Armenia-Turkey normalization
media:group.media:description:
Aid trucks from Armenia crossed the border into Turkey on Saturday, marking the first time the border between the two countries has opened in decades. Richard Giragosian, the director of the Regional Studies Center, wrote in a situation report that his ‚Äúearthquake diplomacy‚Äù stands out as an important gesture of goodwill and offers heightened momentum for the Armenia-Turkey normalization process.
Credits: Ruptly

‘±’§÷Ä’¢’•’ª’°’∂’∏÷Ç’¥ ’¨÷Ä’ª’∏÷Ä’•’∂ ÷Ñ’∂’∂’°÷Ä’Ø’æ’∏÷Ç’¥ ’ß ¬´’∞’∂’°÷Ä’°’æ’∏÷Ä ’∞’°’µ-’´÷Ä’°’∂’°’Ø’°’∂ ’∞’°÷Ä’±’°’Ø’¥’°’∂¬ª ’¨’∏÷Ç÷Ä’® ÷á ’∞’∂’π’∏÷Ç’¥ ’•’∂ ’∞’°’Ø’°’´÷Ä’°’∂’°’Ø’°’∂ ’©’•’¶’•÷Ä: ‘±’§÷Ä’¢’•’ª’°’∂’∏÷Ç’¥ ’∂’°÷á ’æ’•÷Ä’¨’∏÷Ç’Æ’∏÷Ç’¥ ’•’∂ ’Ä’°’µ’°’Ω’ø’°’∂’∏÷Ç’¥ ‘ª÷Ä’°’∂’´ ’§’•’Ω’∫’°’∂’´ ’∞’°’µ’ø’°÷Ä’°÷Ä’∏÷Ç’©’µ’∏÷Ç’∂’∂’•÷Ä’®’ù ’¥’´’ª’°’∂÷Å÷Ñ’´ ’¢’°÷Å’∏÷Ç’¥ ’©’∏÷Ç’µ’¨ ’π’ø’°’¨’∏÷Ç ’¥’°’Ω’´’∂:
’è’•’Ω’°’∂’µ’∏÷Ç’©’® ’∫’°’ø÷Ä’°’Ω’ø’•’¨’´’Ω ÷Ö’£’ø’æ’•’¨ ’•’∂÷Ñ ’µ’∏÷Ç’©’∏÷Ç’¢’µ’°’∂ ’∞’•’ø÷á’µ’°’¨ ’°’¨’´÷Ñ’∂’•÷Ä’´÷Å AZTV, ƒ∞CTƒ∞MAƒ∞ TV, Azad Iran, Baku TV, ARB24, Tv Musavat, ‘º’∏÷Ç÷Ä’•÷Ä
